question: Khadi and Village Industries Commission (KVIC) launched which product, for the first time in India?
explanation:
Indiaâ€™s first-ever Khadi fabric footwear was launched recently by the Khadi and Village Industries Commission (KVIC).
Union MSME Minister Nitin Gadkari was also present during the launch of the product through video conferencing. The footwear will feature several Indian paintings including Madhubani.
